Notable companies that recruited students from UBS this year include American Express, Avery Dennison, Bacardi, Edelweiss Tokio, HSBC, Infosys, Tolaram, Volvo Eicher and HDFC. Sanjam Ghai, 24, a native of New Delhi has been placed in American Express. She received a package of 18.8 lakh per annum.
